articles.title: A ‘tolerant’ India can be majoritarian
articles.description: Mere toleration or empirical plurality of cultures is not the same as a conscious democratic project of multiculturalism
articles.content:
B.R. Ambedkar once said, ... fraternity can be a fact only when there is a nation. Without fraternity, equality and liberty will be no deeper than coats of paint.
In a recent comprehensive face-to-f… [+7100 chars]

articles.author: Paul Withers
articles.title: Canadian fishers keep eye on U.K. as activists raise lobster concerns
articles.description: Activists outside Westminster in London rallied to draw attention to their push for amendments to the Animal Welfare Sentience Bill in the House of Lords. They say boiling live lobsters is inhumane.
articles.content:
Once again politicians in Europe are asking: do lobsters feel pain? Is it animal cruelty to drop them live into pots of boiling water?
For activists outside Westminster in London on Tuesday, the ans… [+4059 chars]
